tool.help:
**Show-coords**
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
show-coords parses the delta alignment output of NUCmer and PROmer, and displays summary information such as position, percent identity and so on, of each alignment. It is the most commonly used tool for analyzing the delta files. Usually the -r is used to sort lines by reference
http://mummer.sourceforge.net/manual/#coords
